name: Itinerary
description:
Welcome to the Jungle, agent. You've been given the very important mission to

retrieve the six lost artifacts

of this mysterious land.



Itinerary is a strategy game where you have to

plan your every move

ahead of time. Once you're done drafting your journey, start your day and prey you don't run into any

monster

!

To help you navigate the dense jungle, you can harvest resources and build structures like

bridges

,

torches

or

baits

.

Made by

HT

in 48h
